server

Methods

(inner) clearCanvas()

Transmits the action of clearing the canvas by the player on turn to others in the lobby.
Source:
  • server.js, line 214

(inner) colorChanged(color)

Transmits the newly set drawing color by the player on turn to others in the lobby.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
color string Hex value of the new drawing color.
Source:
  • server.js, line 188

(inner) disconnecting()

Removes a player from the lobby and transmits it to the others in the lobby.
Source:
  • server.js, line 443

(inner) draw(pos)

Transmits the position where this socket is drawing to others in the lobby.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
pos Object Position object containing x, y position where this socket is drawing.
Source:
  • server.js, line 175

(inner) endGame()

Transmits the end of the game to the others in the lobby. Then sends everyone back to the lobby.
Source:
  • server.js, line 415

(inner) endTurn()

Transmits the end of the turn to the others in the lobby. Then starts a new turn.
Source:
  • server.js, line 396

(inner) getLobbyRoom() → {string}

Gets the id of this socket's lobby.
Source:
  • server.js, line 62

(inner) getLobbyRoom() → {Object}

Gets this socket's lobby.
Source:
  • server.js, line 72

(inner) isAdmin() → {boolean}

Returns whether this socket is an admin.
Source:
  • server.js, line 82

(inner) isOnTurn() → {boolean}

Returns whether this socket is on turn.
Source:
  • server.js, line 92

(inner) join(data)

Connects the socket to the desired lobby and transmit it to others in the lobby. If the lobby doesn't exist, create a new one.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object Object containing the newly joined player's nickname and lobby id.
Source:
  • server.js, line 301

(inner) joinGame()

Tells all other sockets to join the game, if this socket is an admin.
Source:
  • server.js, line 144

(inner) messageSent(message)

Checks whether the sender guessed the word, gives the points, calculates if the word is similar and transmits it to others in the lobby.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
message Object Object containing the message's raw contents.
Source:
  • server.js, line 249

(inner) nextTurn()

Prepares all lobby variables for the next turn. Transmits the data about the next turn to others in the lobby.
Source:
  • server.js, line 344

(inner) otherEmit(event, args)

Emits to everyone in the lobby except the origin.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
event string Event name.
args * Event arguments.
Source:
  • server.js, line 34

(inner) ready()

Marks this socket as ready. If all the sockets in a lobby are ready, the game starts.
Source:
  • server.js, line 326

(inner) roomEmit(event, args)

Emits to everyone in the lobby.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
event string Event name.
args * Event arguments.
Source:
  • server.js, line 48

(inner) roundsChanged(rounds)

Transmits the newly set number of rounds by admin to others in the lobby.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
rounds number Number of rounds in a game.
Source:
  • server.js, line 102

(inner) startDrawing(pos)

Transmits the position where this socket started drawing to others in the lobby.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
pos Object Position object containing x, y position where this socket started drawing.
Source:
  • server.js, line 162

(inner) timeChanged(time)

Transmits the newly set amount of times by admin to others in the lobby.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
time number Amount of time for one turn.
Source:
  • server.js, line 116

(inner) turnDataRequested(socketId)

Sends a request to the admin for sending the data to the corresponding socket.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
socketId string Id of the socket, that requested the data.
Source:
  • server.js, line 226

(inner) turnDataSent(data)

Sends the data recieved from the admin to the socket, that requested it.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data * Object containing current turn time and picture data.
Source:
  • server.js, line 236

(inner) widthChanged(width)

Transmits the newly set line width by the player on turn to others in the lobby.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
width number The width of the brush.
Source:
  • server.js, line 201

(inner) wordsChanged(words)

Transmits the newly set words by admin to others in the lobby.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
words Array.<string> Array of words to choose from in the game.
Source:
